INVOICE_BATCH.text: ----- UE OTB - ONE TIME BILLING - RLC TO: 13-09-05

HEADER.ENTETE_TextPayableAt: Payments accepted in most financial institutions SIPCS 415

ADDRESSES.ADDRESSES_TextPresentAvis: If you have already mailed your payment, please disregard this notice

ITEM.ITEM_description: ADJ 109-SBRS - SILVER WARRANTY BASIC RS BATT N/I
ADJUSTMENT OF THE CREDIT APPLIED TO THE ACCOUNT

MESSAGES.MESSAGE_TextPresentAvis: If you have already mailed your payment, please disregard this notice
MESSAGES.MESSAGE_TextPayableAt: Payments accepted in most financial institutions SIPCS 415
MESSAGES.MESSAGE_TextVousDemenager2: Don't forget to let us know in advance. Contact us during regular business hours:
MESSAGES.MESSAGE_TextPromotion2: For your convenience, make your payments directly from your bank account or on your credit card
MESSAGES.MESSAGE_TextAvis: Visit our new website at : www.protectron.com

CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextContactListAddr: The Following individuals will be contacted if the alarm system is triggered for the following address :
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextNotValidNames: If applicable, please strike out the names that are invalid or add new names to the list.
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextPhoneType2: (BUS: Office) (CEL : Cellular) (PAG : Pager) (RES : Residence) (CHA : Secondary Residence)
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextNotice: Notice to customers that own a system that offers the possibility of programming alarm cancellations (Cancel Alarm) : The monitoring station will not
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextNotice2: proceed the alarm if it has been cancelled by the customer himself using the keypad within moments following the alarm.
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextSignature: Please sign and return this form either by mail or fax
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextSignature2: If we have not received a response within two(2) weeks, we will consider that the information above is correct and that your file is complete.
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextSignature3: Any specific detail or modification done to this file, cancels and replaces all previous agreements or standard protocol.
CL_MESSAGE.CL_TextSignature4: Please fill in block letters the name of the individual authorized to modify customer's file :______
